application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Site Location Plan, Drawing No 01 dated 14/02/2022 (Existing Floor Plans), Drawing No 02 Rev B dated 14/02/2022 (Existing/Proposed Elevations), Drawing No 03 Rev B dated 14/02/2022 (Existing/Proposed Elevations), Drawing No 04 Rev B dated 14/02/2022  (Proposed Floor Plans), Drawing No 05 Rev A dated 14/02/2022 (Existing/Proposed Roof Plans), Drawing No 05 Rev A dated 14/02/2022 (Existing/Proposed Block Plans), Design and Heritage Statement (as received 10/02/2022) and Parking Provision Document.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of detailed in the submitted application form and approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved rooflight to the rear roof slope shall be Conservation style, lie flush with the plane of the roof and be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Hard and soft landscaping to front and side involving re-paving of front path and gravel area and planting; installation of front and side boundary wall and wooden gate; and replacement of roof tiles and roof light to main roof
